content.raw:
Now that we are planning to use this repository for all submissions, including the hello world, it would be nice to update the tutorial to focus on the first phase as an example \(currently it uses phase 2\). At the same time, we should add a directory for each of the three phases in the vrx-events repo. I suggest naming them:

* phase1\_hello\_world
* phase2\_dress\_rehearsal \(currently this is “rehearsal” and it’s the only directory\)
* phase3\_vrx\_challenge

Since I don’t have write access to vrx-repo and need to test the submission process anyway, I’m submitting the above suggestion as a pull request from my private fork.

Also, I put the issue here so as not to fragment our issue tracking \(not sure who is watching the issues on vrx-events\) but I’m not sure how we’re planning to handle this.
